name: Butterfly Effect (Cavacos)
description:
As a last resort in time of war your country creates the ultimate fighting machine - you. You’re created with the purpose of defeating all the kingdoms and making your country rule the world at war - but it’s not going to be easy.

Travel through different kingdoms and several new enemies and bosses, defeating everyone on your way! Luckily you can revive infinitely and upgrade stats and abilities to help you through it!

[THIS PROJECT IS BEING DEVELOPED]

In the current state of the project you can get the feel of what the type of combat is (without abilities yet) and try the upgrade system created for the stats!

More features that will be available:

  • Abilities to help you through the differente kingdoms;
  • Orbs that you can collect fighting bosses of each kingdom that unlock perks;
  • Various types of enemies and bosses;
  • Checkpoints in which you can upgrade or change abilities;
  • Extensive map design.
